hero.title: Bilingual and Technical Education for Your Children
hero.subtitle: Complexe Scolaire Bilingue et Technique Amasia has provided quality education since 1994. We train students in a secure, modern environment focused on academic and technical excellence.

about.title: Who We Are
about.content: Complexe Scolaire Bilingue et Technique Amasia is a kindergarten, primary, general secondary, and technical secondary institution offering superior quality education. Founded in 1994 in Ekounou-Yaoundé, we have become one of Cameroon's most respected bilingual schools.
about.content2: Our unique pedagogical approach combines French and English academic excellence with modern technical training. We prepare our students not only for official examinations but also to become competent, creative, and confident citizens.
about.content3: With over 30 years of experience, we have trained thousands of students who now excel in various professional fields in Cameroon and internationally.

mission.title: Our Mission & Vision
mission.missionContent: To provide young people with superior quality education and modern technical training that prepares them to succeed in a constantly evolving world. We are committed to developing each student's academic, technical, and personal skills in a bilingual and secure environment.
mission.visionContent: To be Cameroon's leading bilingual and technical educational institution, recognized for academic excellence, pedagogical innovation, and training competent and responsible leaders who contribute to our nation's development.

programs.title: Our Educational Programs
programs.subtitle: From kindergarten to high school diploma, complete bilingual training

kindergarten.title: Kindergarten
kindergarten.desc: Stimulating preschool program that awakens children's natural curiosity. We use playful learning methods to develop basic linguistic (French and English), social, and cognitive skills.

primary.title: Primary School
primary.desc: Complete primary program covering all fundamental subjects in French and English. We build solid foundations in reading, writing, mathematics, and sciences.

secondary.title: General Secondary Education
secondary.desc: Complete training from first to final cycle (grades 6-12). Preparation for official exams: BEPC, Probatoire, Baccalauréat (series A, C, D) and GCE O/L and A/L.

technical.title: Technical Education
technical.desc: Quality professional and technical training preparing for Technical BEPC, Technical Probatoire, Technical Baccalauréat diplomas, as well as ITVE and ATVE.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our school

items.a: Classes run Monday to Friday from 7:30 AM to 3:00 PM for primary and 7:30 AM to 4:30 PM for secondary. We also offer evening classes from 5:00 PM to 7:30 PM.

items.q: How does the enrollment process work?
items.a: Enrollment is done in three simple steps: 1) Contact us via WhatsApp at 6 55 58 30 30. 2) Visit our campus in Ekounou. 3) Complete the enrollment file with required documents.

items.q: Do you offer school transport service?
items.a: Yes, we have a secure school transport service covering different neighborhoods of Yaoundé.

items.q: What are the languages of instruction?
items.a: We offer truly bilingual education. Students can follow the Francophone or Anglophone program, or bilingual series.
Tuition fees vary according to level of study. We offer installment payment facilities. Contact us for a personalized fee schedule.

items.q: Does the school have a cafeteria?
items.a: Yes, our cafeteria offers balanced and nutritious meals prepared under impeccable hygiene conditions.

cta.title: Give Your Child a Bright Future
